title: Manage Product Interface (Transmix)
description: When two different products (e.g., gasoline and diesel) are sent back-to-back in a pipeline, a mixture called 'transmix' is created at the interface. An operator must manage this.

tasks.description: Predict the arrival time and volume of the transmix batch at the downstream terminal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system provides an accurate estimate of the transmix arrival and size.

tasks.description: Instruct the terminal to line up the incoming stream to a dedicated transmix storage tank.
tasks.expected_outcome: The terminal confirms it is ready to receive the interface into the correct tank.

tasks.description: Log the volume of transmix received for accounting and reprocessing purposes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The received transmix volume is accurately logged in the inventory system.
